description:
- Create a Sprite to use as the base of the moving platforms
- If you want it to be Up/Down you have to add two points at the base, one for "Top" and one for "Bottom", with those exact names.
- If you want it to be Left/Right you have to add two points in the base, one for "Left" and one for "Right", with those exact names.
- Create a Sprite to use as a moving platform
name: MovingPlatform
shortDescription:
- Create a Sprite to use as base for the moving platforms.
- Create a Sprite to use as moving platform.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Use this Sprite to create moving platforms that are going to move Left/Right/Up/Down. You can decide the direction when you create the moving platforms.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: MovingPlatform

eventsFunctions.name: CreateMovingPlatforms
eventsFunctions.sentence: Create at: _PARAM0_ a total of:_PARAM4_ moving platforms with this sprite: _PARAM2_ and direction: _PARAM5_

eventsFunctions.description: Move the platforms of this base
eventsFunctions.name: MovePlatforms
eventsFunctions.sentence: From this base:_PARAM0_ move this platform:_PARAM2_ move at: _PARAM4_ per second

parameters.description: Number of pixels to move per second
parameters.name: Speed
